original_text: And the silver of them that were numbered of the congregation was an hundred talents, and a thousand seven hundred and threescore and fifteen shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary:
korean_text: 계수된 회중이 드린 은은 성소의 세겔로 백 달란트와 천칠백칠십오 세겔이니

sentences.original_text: And the silver of them that were numbered of the congregation
and a thousand seven hundred and threescore and fifteen shekels
after the shekel of the sanctuary
